channel.title: مهندسی نرم افزار on Amin Rashidbeigi
channel.description: Recent content in مهندسی نرم افزار on Amin Rashidbeigi

item.title: من اولین کسی هستم که پول ریکوستم رو ریویو می‌کنم
item.description: About ten years ago, I started my career as a backend intern at a company. Back then, the main product our team was working on was a multilingual hotel management software. After spending some time watching tutorials and practicing, the tech lead decided I was ready to contribute to the main project, so I officially joined the team. When I completed my first task, I nervously sent my pull request to my manager.
